pages.text: Pet Rocks™ are known to be very sensitive, and may have been traumatized by its sudden newfound sentience.$(br2)It is advised to keep the rock on you at all times for a period of at least 3 to 4 days so it can form a lasting bond with its new owner.$(br2)If you find your Pet Rock™ struggling to adapt to its new
surroundings, some owners have noted that the sound of a nearby TNT fuse appears to have a soothing effect that aids in the imprinting process.
